thread.title: Azerbaijani oil price goes up

author: Apa.az
title: Azerbaijani oil price goes up
text:
Industry and Energy Home page Industry and Energy 0 0 Azerbaijani oil price goes up 10 January 2025 09:45 (UTC +04:00) Azeri Light (CIF) Azerbaijani oil has risen in price on world markets, APA -Economics reports.
The price of 1 barrel of Azerbaijani oil increased by $1.05 or 1.33% to $79.77.
Noted that the previous price of Azerbaijani oil was $78.72.
